page.title: 19St.Donats Castle Art Centre
page.content: John Metcalfe is the Artistic Director of the Art Centre.In the first half of 1984 he was away on sabbatical leave as holder of the University of Wales Creative Arts Fellowship at Gregynogg,Newtown.While he was away Hazel Kirkham deputised. Each year the events held in the Arts Centre seem to become more and more popular.One of the most popular concerts was one given by George Melly the jazz singer.The tickets were sold out weeks before hand.There was a delicious candle-lit supper and George Melly and the group came to have a chat with everyone. Already the Crafts in Action event held over the Spring Bank Holiday has been very successful.Thousands of people came to watch the cabinet makers,silversmiths,blacksmiths and other craftsmen at work.
